special_attacks: fear cone (30 ft., DC 12), mythic power (1/day, surge +1d6)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +11
description: A terrifying darkness surrounds this giant wolf.

sections.body: As a free action, a mythic worg can activate its darkness aura, which reduces the light level within 30 feet of it by one step. This never reduces the light level to supernatural darkness. Multiple worgs within range can reduce the light level multiple steps. Because a mythic worg has darkvision and low-light vision, this ability never interferes with its own vision. It can end this ability as a free action.
sections.name: Darkness Aura

sections.body: A mythic worg is a creature of fear and foul darkness, usually born under an ominous new moon or by the intervention of a deity of shadows and terror. Many serve vampires, protecting their masters from hunters and hazardous daylight.

name: Worg, Mythic
